```{r}
library(stringr)
```

```{r}
# part 1
dt <- readLines("input.txt")
str_count(dt, "\\(") - str_count(dt, "\\)")
```

```{r}
# part 2
dt <- data.frame("paren" = t(str_split_fixed(dt, "", nchar(dt))))
dt$val <- ifelse(dt$paren == "(", 1, -1)
which(cumsum(dt$val) == -1)[1]
```
